topic.title: Unit En Route Time - conformance rules

lines.i: Time unit begins moving toward the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.40"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11145)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10843)/@code="69472-9" Unit responded [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10842)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS (CONF:10844)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11145)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10843)/@code="69472-9" Unit responded [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10842)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS (CONF:10844)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.05

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.40"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1310050111"/> <code code="69472-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Unit responded [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="TS"/> </observation>
